de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.collections

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.collections.Collection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseCollection, SubCollection

    public abstract class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of the IIIF presentation api Represents a collection as defined in the IIIF presentation api May have other collections in its members field TODO: Allow manifest items in members, once the manifest api part is implemented
